data.title: William G. “Bill” Nunn III
data.meta_description: In his portrayal of Do The Right Thing’s Radio Raheem, Bill Nunn personified our battles between love and hate, peace and violence, life and death. Four-finger …
data.text:
In his portrayal of Do The Right Thing’s Radio Raheem, Bill Nunn personified our battles between love and hate, peace and violence, life and death. Four-finger rings have faded to oblivion, but we can still feel Nunn’s character ghetto-blasting up the block. Long live Radio Raheem. We’ll keep those D batteries ready.

Jesse Washington is a journalist and documentary filmmaker. He still gets buckets.
